Posts.Content: Joanne, Congrats to you. I am happy to hear your story. My sister in laws mom is going through IBC. She has such a positive additude. I think that helps her get through the chemo and its affects to your body. Again best of luck to you. lilsis
Posts.Title: Inflammatory breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hi there, Sorry no one has posted to your question. I have no answers. I am just looking for the answer to your question myself. ANYONE ?? Hope this finds you doing well. lilsis
